results.content: This course is not presented in a sequential style. You get overviews first and then instead of walking you through making a new book you get the same overview presented as a deeper dive. Very disappointing from someone hoping for a step-by-step course.

response.content:
Hi Doreen, I am sorry to hear your concern with the course coriculum. The sequence laid out in the course outline begins with overviews to give the student a high level preview of how the project goes together, followed by very thorough sequential lessons on building the EPUB. I see that you have taken 35% of the course and would encourage you to take the rest. I believe you will learn a lot more and see a very in depth and complete course. Please feel free to ask me any questions.

Thank you,
Eric
